botMessages.message: Hello! I'm your **My Org Butler** - a sophisticated AI assistant specialized in Salesforce development and administration. I'm here to help you explore your org, run queries, manage metadata, and visualize your data architecture. What can I assist you with today?

I apologize, but I encountered an error while processing your request. As your **My Org Butler**, I'm designed to handle errors gracefully and transparently. Let me try a different approach or provide you with specific steps to resolve this issue. Could you please rephrase your request or let me know what you were trying to accomplish?

conversationVariables.label: VerifiedCustomerId

conversationVariables.description: The API name of the Salesforce object (such as Account or Opportunity) associated with the record the user wants to interact with. Do not use this if the user is already talking about another object in the conversation.
conversationVariables.label: currentObjectApiName

conversationVariables.description: The ID of the record on the user's screen. It may not relate to the user's input. Only use this if the user input mentions 'this', 'current', 'the record', etc. If in doubt, don't use it.
conversationVariables.label: currentRecordId
